about_the_game: Could you manipulate and trick a complete stranger into saying what you want to hear? Do you have the social hacking skills to steer a conversation? Prank Call is a unique game where online players try to outsmart streamers and players in a verbal battle of wits.
detailed_description: Could you manipulate and trick a complete stranger into saying what you want to hear? Do you have the social hacking skills to steer a conversation? Prank Call is a unique game where online players try to outsmart streamers and players in a verbal battle of wits.
name: Prank Call Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2.20 GHz (dual-core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 7690M XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Microphone Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Try the Prank Call demo and start prank calling online players and streamers now!
